pages.text: $(li)The Sunken Shrine is a structure that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)It is just an old shrine that was swallowed by the force of the ocean a long time ago along with its treasures and their devotees.
$(li)These $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/drowned)Drowned$(/l) devootees will continue to defend the Sunker Shrine for foreigners at all costs.
